properties.Name: SourceDocument
properties.Description:
The source document is the original record of a transaction.     

Source documents are important as evidence of the business transaction is case proof is required (ex: audit).

Columns.Name: SourceDocumentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a source document involved in a transaction.

Columns.Name: SourceDocumentDate
Columns.Description: The official date on the source document.

Columns.Name: Description
Columns.Description: A description of the source document.

Columns.Name: Amount
Columns.Description: The amount of the source document.

Columns.Name: StorageLocationId
Columns.Description: The location where the source document is stored.

Columns.Name: SourceDocumentTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Source Document Type.

Columns.Name: SourceDocumentInputTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Source Document Input Type.

Columns.Name: TransactionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Transaction.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.

Columns.Name: InvoiceId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Invoice.
